title: Advanced Language Proficiency Course Using Simulation-Based Collaborative Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and comprehension of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical communication skills through multinational team project simulations in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to interpret complex work scenarios and negotiate with peers to derive optimal solutions through CANA activities
Learners can perform language expression negotiations reflecting cultural contexts with over 80% accuracy in VR simulations
Learners document more than 10 conflict-resolution strategies generated during collaborative learning into formats applicable to real work environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
